Details: National Vanilla custard powder is the perfect treat for your everyday sweet cravings with its delightful Vanilla flavor and creamy texture. National ensures you get irresistibly delicious custard in no time! Add it to tarts and trifles, donuts and pies, top with your favourite fruit, or indulge in this creamy delight all on its own.
Recipe:
Vanilla Custard is a versatile ingredient that can be used in various dishes. Here's a simple recipe for Vanilla Custard that you can use as a starting point, and later, you can explore different ways to incorporate it into your meals.

Ingredients:
1. 2 cups (473 ml) whole milk
2. 2 large eggs
3. 3/4 cup (150 grams) granulated sugar
4. 1/4 cup (30 grams) cornstarch
5. 1 vanilla bean, split and scraped, or 2 teaspoons (10 ml) pure vanilla extract
6. 2 tablespoons (30 grams) unsalted butter

Instructions:
1. In a medium-sized saucepan, combine milk, sugar, cornstarch, and the vanilla bean seeds (or extract). Whisk until the sugar is dissolved.

2. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs. Gradually pour some of the milk mixture into the eggs, whisking constantly, to temper the eggs. This process will prevent the eggs from cooking and scrambling.

3. Pour the tempered egg mixture back into the saucepan with the milk, and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly with a heatproof spatula or whisk.

4. Cook until the custard thickens and begins to bubble around the edges, about 5-7 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in the butter until fully incorporated.

5. Strain the custard through a fine-mesh sieve into a bowl, pressing on the solids to extract as much custard as possible. If you used vanilla extract instead of a bean, you can skip this step.

6. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap, pressing the wrap directly onto the surface of the custard to prevent a skin from forming. Chill in the refrigerator until cold, at least 2 hours or up to 3 days.

Common uses for Vanilla Custard:
1. As a dessert topping for fruits, cakes, or pastries
2. In pies, tarts, and other baked goods
3. As a filling for éclairs, profiteroles, and other pastries
4. As a base for ice cream or sorbet
5. Mixed with whipped cream to make a trifle
6. As a sauce for pancakes or waffles
7. In bread pudding or rice pudding recipes.
Ingredients: 5. 1 vanilla bean, split and scraped, or 2 teaspoons (10 ml) pure vanilla extract

Details: National Mango custard powder is the perfect treat for your everyday sweet cravings with its fruity mango flavor and creamy texture. National ensures you get irresistibly delicious custard in no time! Add it to tarts and trifles, donuts and pies, top with your favourite fruit, or indulge in this creamy delight all on its own.
Recipe:
Mango Custard is a delicious dessert on its own, but it can also be used as an ingredient in other dishes to add a unique flavor and texture. Here's a simple recipe for a Mango Custard Tart that uses mango custard as a filling:

Ingredients:
1. 1 1/2 cups of graham cracker crumbs
2. 3 tablespoons of granulated sugar
3. 6 tablespoons of melted unsalted butter
4. 2 cans (14 oz each) of sweetened condensed milk
5. 1 can (12 oz) of evaporated milk
6. 3 large eggs
7. 1 tablespoon of cornstarch
8. 2 ripe mangoes, peeled and sliced
9. Whipped cream (optional)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. In a medium bowl, mix the graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and melted butter until well combined. Press this mixture into the bottom and up the sides of a 9-inch tart pan. Bake for 10 minutes, or until lightly golden. Set aside to cool.
3. In a large bowl, whisk together the sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk, eggs, and cornstarch until smooth.
4. Place the mango custard mixture in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens and comes to a boil. Remove from heat and stir in the chopped mangoes.
5. Pour the mango custard into the cooled tart shell. Smooth the top with a spatula.
6. Let the tart cool to room temperature, then refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or until chilled.
7. Before serving, top with whipped cream, if desired.

Enjoy your Mango Custard Tart! This dessert is perfect for summer parties or as a sweet end to a family dinner.
Ingredients: 4. 2 cans (14 oz each) of sweetened condensed milk

Details: National Strawberry custard powder is the perfect treat for your everyday sweet cravings with its fruity strawberry flavor and creamy texture. National ensures you get irresistbly delicious custard in no time! Add it to tarts and trifles, donuts and pies, top with your favourite fruit, or indulge in this creamy delight all on its own.
Recipe:
Recipe: Strawberry Custard Parfait

Ingredients:
1. 1 cup (250 ml) Strawberry Custard
2. 1 cup (250 ml) Fresh Strawberries, sliced
3. 1 cup (240 g) Greek Yogurt
4. 1/2 cup (60 g) Granulated Sugar
5. 3 Egg Yolks
6. 2 tbsp (30 ml) Cornstarch
7. 2 cups (500 ml) Whole Milk
8. 1 tsp (5 ml) Vanilla Extract
9. 1 cup (120 g) Graham Cracker Crumbs
10. 2 tbsp (30 g) Unsalted Butter, melted
11. Optional: Whipped Cream for topping

Instructions:
1. To make the strawberry custard, combine sugar, egg yolks, and cornstarch in a medium bowl. Set aside.
2. In a saucepan, heat milk over medium heat until just simmering. Gradually whisk the hot milk into the egg yolk mixture to temper it.
3. Return the mixture to the saucepan and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the custard thickens and begins to bubble. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract.
4. Strain the custard through a fine-mesh sieve into a bowl to remove any lumps. Stir in the strawberries. Allow the custard to cool to room temperature, then refrigerate until chilled.
5. To make the graham cracker crumb crust, mix graham cracker crumbs and melted butter in a bowl until well combined. Press the mixture into the bottom of serving glasses.
6. Layer the chilled strawberry custard, Greek yogurt, and more strawberries on top of the graham cracker crust, repeating the layers as desired.
7. Chill the parfaits for at least 2 hours, or until set. If desired, top with whipped cream before serving.

Enjoy your Strawberry Custard Parfait!

1. 1 cup (250 ml) Strawberry Custard (Ingredients for this are: 1/2 cup (60 g) Granulated Sugar, 3 Egg Yolks, 2 tbsp (30 ml) Cornstarch, 2 cups (500 ml) Whole Milk, 1 tsp (5 ml) Vanilla Extract, 1 cup (250 ml) Fresh Strawberries)

Recipe:
Banana Jelly is a sweet, gelatinous product that can be used in a variety of desserts and dishes. While it's not traditionally used in savory cooking, its versatility allows for creative uses. Here's a simple recipe for Banana Jelly with Cream and Toasted Coconut, a delightful dessert.

Ingredients:
1. Banana Jelly - 1 (8 oz) can
2. Heavy Cream - 1 cup
3. Granulated Sugar - 1 tbsp
4. Unsweetened Desiccated Coconut - 1/2 cup
5. Salt - a pinch
6. Butter - 1 tbsp

Instructions:
1. Toast the unsweetened desiccated coconut: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add the coconut and toast it, stirring frequently, until golden brown. This should take around 3-5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.

2. In a medium-sized saucepan, whisk together the heavy cream and granulated sugar. Heat over medium heat until the sugar has completely dissolved. Do not let the cream boil.

3. Once the sugar has dissolved, remove the saucepan from the heat and let it cool slightly.

4. Open the can of banana jelly and pour it into a serving bowl.

5. Pour the slightly cooled heavy cream mixture over the banana jelly. Stir gently to mix them together.

6. Chill the mixture in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours, or until it has set.

7. Before serving, sprinkle the toasted coconut over the top of the dessert.

Enjoy your Banana Jelly with Cream and Toasted Coconut! This dish has a lovely texture and a unique taste that will delight your taste buds.

Recipe: Mango Jelly with Sliced Fruits and Cream

Ingredients:
1. 1 pack (227g/8 oz) of Mango Jelly
2. 1 cup (240 ml) of boiling water
3. 1 can (20 oz) of pineapple chunks in juice, drained
4. 1 cup (150 g) of sliced strawberries
5. 1 cup (150 g) of sliced kiwi fruits
6. 1 cup (240 ml) of heavy cream
7. 1 tablespoon (15 ml) of granulated sugar (optional)

Instructions:
1. In a large bowl, stir the mango jelly into the boiling water until completely dissolved.
2. If you prefer a sweeter jelly, you can add 1 tablespoon of sugar at this step.
3. Pour the dissolved jelly into a serving dish and let it cool in the refrigerator until it sets, about 2-3 hours or overnight.
4. Once the jelly is set, top it with the drained pineapple chunks, sliced strawberries, and sliced kiwi fruits.
5. Just before serving, whip the heavy cream until it forms soft peaks. Spread the whipped cream on top of the fruits.
6. Garnish with a sprig of mint if desired, and serve immediately.

Enjoy your Mango Jelly with Sliced Fruits and Cream!
Ingredients: 3. 1 can (20 oz) of pineapple chunks in juice, drained
5. 1 cup (150 g) of sliced kiwi fruits

Recipe: Strawberry Jam and Cream Cheese Sandwich

Ingredients:
1. 2 slices of bread (preferably soft bread like white or whole grain)
2. 2 tablespoons of Strawberry Jelly
3. 4 ounces (113 grams) of cream cheese, softened
4. Optional: A few fresh strawberries for garnish

Instructions:
1. Spread softened cream cheese evenly on one side of each slice of bread.
2. Spread about 1 tablespoon of strawberry jelly on the other side of one slice of bread.
3. Carefully place the jelly-side down on top of the cream cheese-covered slice.
4. Press gently to ensure the sandwich holds together.
5. If desired, cut the sandwich into halves or quarters, and garnish with sliced fresh strawberries.
6. Serve immediately or wrap in cling film and refrigerate for later use.

Enjoy your Strawberry Jam and Cream Cheese Sandwich!

Recipe: Fruit Salad with Mixed Fruit Jelly Dressing

Ingredients:
1. 2 cups of mixed fruits (like strawberries, grapes, pineapple, orange segments, and kiwi)
2. 1 cup of fresh mint leaves
3. 1 cup of mixed fruit jelly
4. 2 tablespoons of lemon juice
5. 1 cup of boiling water
6. 2 tablespoons of sugar (optional, if your fruit jelly isn't sweet enough)

Instructions:
1. Wash the mixed fruits thoroughly and cut them into bite-sized pieces. Set aside.
2. In a large bowl, combine the mixed fruits and mint leaves. Mix gently to ensure the mint leaves are evenly distributed.
3. In a small saucepan, add the mixed fruit jelly and boiling water. Stir until the jelly dissolves completely. If your jelly is not sweet enough, you can add sugar at this stage, stirring until it dissolves.
4. Remove the saucepan from heat and let it cool down slightly.
5. Pour the cooled jelly mixture over the fruit salad. Gently toss the salad to ensure all the fruits are coated with the jelly.
6. Chill the fruit salad in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving. This allows the jelly to set and the flavors to meld together.

Enjoy your Fruit Salad with Mixed Fruit Jelly Dressing!

Details: Feerni is a traditional dessert made with ground rice and flavored with cardamom and saffron. With our Feerni Mix, you can prepare this creamy, delicious treat quickly and easily, ensuring a delightful end to any meal.
Recipe:
Feerni Mix is a convenient product that simplifies the process of making feerni. Follow this step-by-step recipe to prepare Feerni using the mix:

Ingredients:
1. Feerni Mix (1 packet)
2. Milk (4 cups)
3. Sugar (to taste)
4. Cardamom powder (1 tsp)
5. Saffron strands (a pinch)
6. Chopped nuts (almonds, pistachios, etc. for garnish)
7. Rose water (optional, for flavor)

Instructions:
1. In a pot, bring 4 cups of milk to a boil over medium heat.
2. Once the milk starts boiling, add the Feerni Mix gradually while stirring continuously to avoid lumps.
3. Add sugar to taste and continue stirring the mixture until it thickens (about 10-15 minutes).
4. Add cardamom powder and saffron strands, mixing well.
5. Remove the pot from heat and allow the feerni to cool slightly.
6. Pour the mixture into serving bowls and refrigerate until set (about 2-3 hours).
7. Garnish with chopped nuts and a few drops of rose water before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Feerni!
Ingredients: Here are the ingredients listed in the Feerni Mix recipe:
6. Chopped nuts (almonds, pistachios, etc. for garnish)

Details: Recreate your favorite traditional dessert with National Pistachio Kheer Mix. This easy to prepare mix will give you an authentic flavor, creamy texture and just the right amount of sweetness, making it the perfect dessert for all your special occasions.
Recipe:
Pistachio Kheer Mix is a ready-made ingredient used to make a traditional Indian dessert called Kheer. Here's a simple recipe using Pistachio Kheer Mix:

Ingredients:
1. Pistachio Kheer Mix (1 box)
2. 4 cups of full-fat milk
3. 1/2 cup of sugar (adjust to taste)
4. 1 tbsp of ghee (clarified butter)
5. 8-10 slices of almonds and pistachios for garnish
6. 1 tbsp of sliced or crushed pistachios for garnish
7. 1 tbsp of raisins for garnish
8. 1 tbsp of chopped dates for garnish

Instructions:
1. In a heavy-bottomed saucepan, heat the ghee over medium heat.
2. Add the sliced almonds and pistachios to the ghee and roast until lightly golden brown. Remove from the pan and set aside for garnish.
3. Pour 4 cups of full-fat milk into the same saucepan and bring it to a boil over medium heat.
4. Once the milk starts to boil, reduce the heat to low and add the entire box of Pistachio Kheer Mix. Stir continuously until the mix is fully dissolved and the milk thickens slightly.
5. Add the sugar to the mixture and stir until it is fully dissolved.
6. Cook the kheer on low heat for about 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
7. Remove the kheer from heat and let it cool down to room temperature.
8. Garnish the Pistachio Kheer with the roasted sliced almonds and pistachios, raisins, chopped dates, and a sprinkle of crushed pistachios.
9. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

Enjoy your homemade Pistachio Kheer!
Ingredients: 7. 1 tbsp of sliced or crushed pistachios

Details: Recreate your favorite traditional dessert with National Kheer Mix. This easy to prepare mix will give you an authentic flavor, creamy texture and just the right amount of sweetness, making it the perfect dessert for all your special occasions.
Recipe:
Kheer Mix is a common ingredient used to make a sweet dish called Kheer or Rice Pudding. Here's a simple recipe for making Kheer with Kheer Mix:

Ingredients:
1. 1 packet of Kheer Mix (usually contains sweetened basmati rice, sugar, and sometimes milk powder)
2. 4 cups of whole milk
3. 2 cups of water
4. 1 tsp of cardamom powder
5. 10-12 almonds and pistachios (optional, for garnish)
6. 2-3 strands of saffron (optional)

Instructions:
1. Soak the saffron strands in 2 tbsp of warm milk for 10-15 minutes.
2. In a large saucepan, combine the milk, water, and the contents of the Kheer Mix packet. Stir well to dissolve the mix.
3. Bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally to prevent burning.
4. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover the saucepan, and let it simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
5. Add the soaked saffron and its milk to the simmering mixture. Stir well.
6. Add the cardamom powder and mix well.
7. Cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. The Kheer should have thickened by now. If it's too thick, add a little more milk. If it's too thin, let it cook for a few more minutes.
8. Turn off the heat and let the Kheer cool down to room temperature.
9. Garnish with sliced almonds and pistachios before serving.

Enjoy your homemade Kheer! Remember, you can adjust the sweetness and consistency to your liking. Happy cooking!

No recipe needed for this ready-made product:
1. Canned Coconut Milk – It can be used in various recipes, such as curries, soups, and desserts, to add a rich, creamy texture and flavor.
2. Ready-made pie crust – It can be used to make pies, tarts, and quiches quickly and easily. Just follow the instructions on the package for baking times and temperatures.

Recipe: Vermicelli Upma (Indian Semolina Dishes)

Ingredients:
1. 200 grams of Vermicelli (also known as Semolina Noodles)
2. 3 tablespoons of Vegetable Oil
3. 1 medium-sized Onion, finely chopped
4. 1 medium-sized Tomato, finely chopped
5. 1 Green Chili, finely chopped (optional)
6. 1 teaspoon of Mustard Seeds
7. 1 teaspoon of Urad Dal (split black gram lentils)
8. 1 teaspoon of Chana Dal (split chickpeas)
9. 1/2 teaspoon of Turmeric Powder
10. 1 teaspoon of Salt
11. 3 cups of Water
12. 1 cup of Peas and Carrots (mixed frozen vegetables)
13. 1 tablespoon of Lemon Juice
14. 2 tablespoons of Fresh Cilantro, chopped
15. 1-2 tablespoons of Ghee (clarified butter) or Vegetable Oil
16. 1-2 tablespoons of Roasted Peanuts (optional)

Steps:
1. Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large skillet or pot over medium heat.
2. Add mustard seeds, urad dal, and chana dal. Sauté until the seeds crackle and the lentils turn golden brown.
3. Add finely chopped onions, green chili (if using), and sauté until the onions turn translucent.
4. Add finely chopped tomatoes, mix well, and cook for about 2 minutes.
5. Add turmeric powder, salt, and mixed vegetables (peas and carrots). Stir well, cook for about 1-2 minutes, and set aside.
6. In a separate large pot, bring 3 cups of water to a boil.
7. Add 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil to the boiling water. Then slowly add the vermicelli, stirring continuously to prevent it from sticking together.
8. Once the vermicelli is fully soaked, drain the excess water using a colander.
9. Add the sautéed vegetable mixture to the cooked vermicelli. Mix well.
10. Drizzle 1-2 tablespoons of ghee or vegetable oil, lemon juice, and stir.
11. Garnish with fresh cilantro and roasted peanuts (optional) before serving.

Enjoy your Vermicelli Upma!
Ingredients: 1. Vermicelli (also known as Semolina Noodles) - 200 grams
2. Vegetable Oil - 3 tablespoons (plus 1 tablespoon for step 1, 2 tablespoons for step 7)
7. Urad Dal (split black gram lentils) - 1 teaspoon
12. Peas and Carrots (mixed frozen vegetables) - 1 cup
15. Ghee (clarified butter) or Vegetable Oil - 1-2 tablespoons (for step 10)

Recipe:
Recipe: Apple Jam and Cheese Toast with Walnuts

Ingredients:
1. 2 slices of your favorite bread (preferably a thick slice)
2. 2-3 tablespoons of Chunky Apple Jam
3. 100g of your favorite cheese (Brie, Camembert, or Cheddar)
4. 2 tablespoons of chopped walnuts
5. 1 teaspoon of honey
6. A pinch of salt

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C) or use a toaster on the 'grill' setting.
2. If using a toaster, lightly toast the bread slices. If using an oven, place the slices on a baking sheet and toast them for 5-6 minutes until lightly browned.
3. Once the bread is toasted, spread 1-1.5 tablespoons of Apple Jam evenly on each slice.
4. Cut the cheese into thin slices or crumble it, and place it on top of the Apple Jam.
5. Sprinkle the chopped walnuts over the cheese.
6. Drizzle a little honey on top of the walnuts.
7. Season with a pinch of salt.
8. If using an oven, put the toast back in for 2-3 minutes until the cheese is melted and slightly browned. If using a toaster, use the 'grill' setting for 30 seconds to 1 minute, checking frequently to avoid burning.
9. Remove from the oven or toaster and let it cool for a minute or two before serving.

Enjoy your Apple Jam and Cheese Toast with Walnuts! It's a delicious and easy-to-make dish that's perfect for breakfast, lunch, or as a snack.
Ingredients: 1. 2 slices of your favorite bread (preferably a thick slice)
3. 100g of your favorite cheese (Brie, Camembert, or Cheddar)

Recipe:
Recipe: Mango Jam and Cream Cheese Stuffed French Toast

Ingredients:
1. 8 slices of bread (preferably thick-cut)
2. 4 oz (113g) cream cheese, softened
3. 1/2 cup (120g) Chunky Mango Jam
4. 3 large eggs
5. 1 1/2 cups (355ml) milk
6. 1 tsp vanilla extract
7. 1/2 tsp ground cinnamon
8. 2 tbsp (28g) unsalted butter
9. Powdered sugar (for dusting)
10. Fresh mint leaves (optional, for garnish)

Instructions:
1. In a medium-sized bowl, combine softened cream cheese and Chunky Mango Jam. Mix until smooth.
2. Spread an even layer of the mango jam and cream cheese mixture on 4 slices of bread. Place the remaining 4 slices of bread on top, creating sandwiches. Press gently to ensure the filling stays inside.
3. In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon.
4. Heat a large non-stick skillet over medium heat and add butter.
5. Dip each sandwich into the egg mixture, coating both sides, and place it in the skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and the bread is nicely toasted. Repeat with all sandwiches.
6. Dust the cooked French toast with powdered sugar and garnish with fresh mint leaves, if desired.
7. Serve warm and enjoy your Mango Jam and Cream Cheese Stuffed French Toast!

Recipe: Strawberry Jam and Cream Cheese Bagels

Ingredients:
1. 4 bagels (plain or whole grain, your choice)
2. 8 oz cream cheese, softened
3. 1/2 cup Chunky Strawberry Jam
4. Fresh mint leaves (optional)

Instructions:
1. Toast the bagels to your liking. You can do this in a toaster or in a preheated oven at 375°F (190°C) for about 10 minutes.
2. While the bagels are toasting, soften the cream cheese in a microwave for about 30 seconds or until easily spreadable.
3. Once the bagels are toasted, let them cool for a few minutes.
4. Spread a generous layer of softened cream cheese on one half of each bagel.
5. Top the cream cheese with a dollop of Chunky Strawberry Jam, about 1-2 tablespoons per bagel.
6. Garnish with fresh mint leaves if desired, for a pop of color and freshness.
7. Serve immediately and enjoy your Strawberry Jam and Cream Cheese Bagels!

Recipe: Fruit Jam and Cheese Crostini

Ingredients:
1. 1 loaf of French bread or Italian bread
2. 1 cup of Chunky Mixed Fruit Jam
3. 8 oz of your favorite soft cheese (like Brie, Camembert, or Cream Cheese)
4. Fresh mint leaves for garnish (optional)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. Slice the bread into 1/2-inch thick slices.
3. Arrange the bread slices on the prepared baking sheet.
4. Place the slices in the oven and bake for 5-8 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
5. Let the toasted bread slices cool for a few minutes.
6. Soften the cheese by heating it in a microwave for 15-30 seconds, or until it's spreadable.
7. Spread a thin layer of the softened cheese on each toasted bread slice.
8. Top each cheese-covered slice with a spoonful of Chunky Mixed Fruit Jam.
9. Garnish with fresh mint leaves, if desired.
10. Serve immediately and enjoy your Fruit Jam and Cheese Crostini.

Enjoy your meal!
Ingredients: Based on the provided recipe, here are the main ingredients:
1. 1 loaf of French bread or Italian bread
2. 1 cup of Chunky Mixed Fruit Jam
3. 8 oz of your favorite soft cheese (like Brie, Camembert, or Cream Cheese)

Details: Experience the delicious taste of National Apple jam, the perfect start to your breakfast every morning! This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, becomes the perfect sweet topping for pancakes, french toasts and cake and can also be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too like pastry tarts and cheesecakes!
Recipe:
Recipe: Apple Jam and Cheese Tartlet

Ingredients:
1. 1 cup of Apple Jam
2. 1 sheet of pre-rolled puff pastry
3. 100g of your favorite soft cheese (like Brie or Camembert)
4. 1 egg, beaten
5. A handful of sliced almonds
6. Honey or powdered sugar for garnish (optional)

Steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 180°C (350°F) and line a muffin tin with 6 muffin cups.
2. Unroll the puff pastry sheet and cut it into 6 equal squares. Press each square into the prepared muffin cups, making sure the edges are tucked in and the bottoms are even.
3. Place a small spoonful of apple jam in the center of each pastry cup.
4. Cut the soft cheese into small cubes or slices and place them on top of the apple jam.
5. Brush the edges of the pastry with the beaten egg.
6. Sprinkle sliced almonds on top of the cheese.
7. Bake the tartlets for 15-20 minutes, or until the pastry is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Allow the tartlets to cool for a few minutes before removing them from the muffin tin.
9. Drizzle with honey or dust with powdered sugar for added sweetness, if desired.

Enjoy your Apple Jam and Cheese Tartlets! They are perfect as a dessert or an afternoon snack.

Details: Experience the delicious taste of National Mixed fruit jam, the perfect start to your breakfast every morning! This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, becomes the perfect sweet topping for pancakes, french toasts and cake and can also be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too like pastry tarts and cheesecakes!
Recipe:
Recipe: Mixed Fruit Jam Swirl Bread

Ingredients:
1. 1 loaf of unsliced bread (preferably a sweet bread like challah or brioche)
2. 1 cup (250g) of Mixed Fruit Jam
3. 50g of unsalted butter, melted
4. 2 tbsp of granulated sugar
5. Optional: 1/2 cup of chopped nuts (almonds, walnuts, or pecans)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a baking dish.
2. Slice the bread lengthwise, but not all the way through. You want to create a pocket for the jam.
3. Spread the melted butter evenly on both cut sides of the bread.
4. Spread the mixed fruit jam generously over one of the buttered sides. You can also sprinkle the chopped nuts on top of the jam for an extra crunch.
5. Close the bread by pressing the jam-covered side onto the other side.
6. Place the loaf in the prepared baking dish, butter-side up.
7. Sprinkle the remaining granulated sugar over the bread.
8. Bake in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and the jam is bubbling.
9. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your Mixed Fruit Jam Swirl Bread! It's a great breakfast or brunch dish, and it also makes a delicious dessert with a scoop of vanilla ice cream on the side.

Recipe: Mango Jam and Cream Cheese Baguette Toast

Ingredients:
1. 1 loaf of French baguette
2. 8 oz (227g) cream cheese, softened
3. 1 cup (240g) Mango Jam
4. Optional: Chopped nuts (like almonds or walnuts) and fresh mint leaves for garnish

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C) and slice the baguette diagonally into 1-inch thick pieces.
2. Arrange the baguette slices on a baking sheet and bake for 5-7 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
3. In a bowl, mix the softened cream cheese until it's smooth and creamy.
4. Spread a generous layer of the cream cheese on one side of each toasted baguette slice.
5. Top the cream cheese with about 1-2 teaspoons of mango jam, depending on your preference.
6. If desired, sprinkle some chopped nuts and fresh mint leaves on top for additional texture and flavor.
7. Serve immediately and enjoy your Mango Jam and Cream Cheese Baguette Toast!

Details: Experience the delicious taste of National Mango jam, the perfect start to your breakfast every morning This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, adds a perfect flavour to your yoghurt and can be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too.
Recipe:
Mango Jam is a sweet and delicious spread made from ripe mangoes, sugar, and sometimes lemon juice or other spices. It's a versatile ingredient that can be used in various dishes to add sweetness, texture, and a tropical twist. Here are three recipes where you can use Mango Jam:

1. Mango Jam Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
- 12-15 chicken wings
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 cup Mango Jam
- 1 tablespoon soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon rice vinegar
- 1 teaspoon sriracha (optional)
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tablespoon grated ginger
- Sesame seeds for garnish

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. Season the chicken wings with salt and pepper, then bake for 30-35 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.
3. In a saucepan, combine the Mango Jam, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sriracha (if using), garlic, and ginger. Heat over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture begins to bubble and thicken.
4. Once the chicken wings are done, toss them in the Mango Jam glaze until well coated.
5. Return the chicken wings to the baking sheet, and bake for an additional 5-7 minutes, or until the glaze is caramelized and sticky.
6. Garnish with sesame seeds and serve hot.

2. Mango Jam and Cream Cheese Stuffed French Toast
Ingredients:
- 1 loaf of challah bread, sliced 1.5 inches thick
- 3 eggs
- 1 cup milk
- 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
- 8 ounces cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 cup Mango Jam
- 1/2 cup powdered sugar
- Maple syrup and fresh fruits for serving

Instructions:
1. In a shallow dish, whisk together the eggs, milk, and vanilla extract.
2. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly coat with butter or cooking spray.
3. Spread a layer of cream cheese on one side of a slice of bread, then spread a layer of Mango Jam on top. Place another slice of bread on top, cream cheese side down.
4. Dip the sandwich into the egg mixture, making sure both sides are well coated.
5. Cook the sandwich in the skillet for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and the cheese is melted.
6. Repeat with the remaining bread slices.
7. Serve the stuffed french toast with a dollop of Mango Jam, powdered sugar, and maple syrup drizzle.

3. Mango Jam and Cream Cheese Swirl Brioche Bread
Ingredients:
- 1 loaf of brioche bread
- 8 ounces cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 cup Mango Jam
- 1 egg, beaten
- Sliced almonds for garnish

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Slice the brioche bread lengthwise, leaving about 1 inch at the bottom attached.
3. In a bowl, combine the softened cream cheese and Mango Jam.
4. Spread the cream cheese mixture evenly on the inside of the sliced bread.
5. Close the bread and place it on a baking sheet. Brush the beaten egg on the top of the bread.
6. Sprinkle sliced almonds on top of the egg wash.
7. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the bread is heated through.
8. Slice and serve.

Enjoy your Mango Jam dishes!

Recipe:
Recipe: Apple Jam and Cheese Tart

Ingredients:
1. 1 (9-inch) pre-baked pie crust
2. 1 cup of apple jam
3. 1 cup of shredded cheddar cheese
4. 1/2 cup of sliced almonds
5. 1 egg, beaten
6. 1 tablespoon of water
7. 1 tablespoon of sugar

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Spread the apple jam evenly over the bottom of the pre-baked pie crust.
3. Sprinkle the shredded cheddar cheese evenly over the apple jam.
4. Sprinkle the sliced almonds over the cheese.
5. In a small bowl, beat the egg and water together. Brush this mixture over the edges of the pie crust.
6. Sprinkle the tablespoon of sugar over the egg wash.
7. Place the tart in the preheated oven and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
8. Allow the tart to cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your Apple Jam and Cheese Tart!

This easy to spread jam makes a wonderful spread on all kinds of breads, becomes the perfect sweet topping for pancakes, french toasts and cake and can also be used to prepare a wide variety of desserts too like pastry tarts and cheesecakes!
Recipe:
Recipe: Mixed Fruit Jam and Cheese Crostini

Ingredients:
1. 1 loaf of Italian bread (or any crusty bread of your choice)
2. 1 cup of mixed fruit jam (preferably homemade or high-quality store-bought)
3. 8 oz of cream cheese, softened
4. 1/4 cup of honey
5. 1/2 cup of sliced almonds
6. Fresh mint leaves for garnish

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
2. Slice the bread into 1/2-inch thick slices and arrange them on the prepared baking sheet.
3. In a bowl, mix softened cream cheese with honey until well combined.
4. Spread a thin layer of the honey-cream cheese mixture on each slice of bread.
5. Spoon a teaspoonful of mixed fruit jam on top of the honey-cream cheese layer.
6. Sprinkle sliced almonds evenly over the jam.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 8-10 minutes, or until the edges of the bread are lightly toasted.
8. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.
9. Garnish with fresh mint leaves before serving.

Enjoy your Mixed Fruit Jam and Cheese Crostini! This sweet and savory dish is perfect as an appetizer or a light dessert.

Details: National Spicy Coriander Chutney brings the flavor of the fresh coriander with a touch of spice and give your food a unique twist.
Recipe:
Ingredients:
1. 2 tbsp Coriander Chutney
2. 1 cup Greek Yogurt
3. 1 tsp Lemon Juice
4. Salt to taste
5. 1 cucumber, sliced
6. 1 small red onion, finely chopped
7. 1 small carrot, grated
8. 1 jalapeño pepper, seeds removed and finely chopped (optional)
9. 1 cup mixed salad greens
10. 1 pita bread, cut into triangles

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix the coriander chutney, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, and salt until well combined. Taste and adjust seasonings if needed.
2. In a separate bowl, combine sliced cucumber, chopped red onion, grated carrot, jalapeño pepper (if using), and mixed salad greens.
3. To serve, spread the chutney yogurt sauce on the bottom half of a pita bread. Top with the vegetable salad mixture. Fold the pita bread in half.
4. Serve with additional sauce on the side if desired. Enjoy your Coriander Chutney Pita Salad!

Details: National Sweet & Sour Plum Chutney Sauce gives you a unique twist of flavors that hits the spot every time and add a touch of sweetness with a tangy kick to any snack.
Recipe:
Plum Chutney is a versatile condiment that can be used in various dishes to add a sweet and tangy flavor. Here are three recipes using Plum Chutney:

1. Plum Chutney Chicken Curry

Ingredients:
- 500g boneless chicken breasts, cut into cubes
- 2 tbsp vegetable oil
- 1 large onion, finely chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1-inch piece of ginger, grated
- 1 green chili, finely chopped (optional)
- 1 tsp cumin seeds
- 1 tsp coriander powder
- 1 tsp turmeric powder
- 1 tsp red chili powder
- 2 tbsp Plum Chutney
- 1 can (400ml) coconut milk
- Salt to taste
- Fresh coriander leaves for garnish

Instructions:
1. Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add cumin seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
2. Add chopped onions, garlic, ginger, and green chili (if using). Sauté until onions are translucent.
3. Add the cubed chicken and cook until browned. Stir occasionally to prevent sticking.
4. Add cumin seeds, coriander powder, turmeric powder, and red chili powder. Stir well to coat the chicken with the spices.
5. Add Plum Chutney and mix thoroughly. Cook for 2 minutes.
6. Pour in the coconut milk and stir well. Season with salt.
7. Reduce heat to low, cover the pan, and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the curry has thickened.
8. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves before serving.

2. Plum Chutney Baked Salmon

Ingredients:
- 2 salmon fillets, skin removed
- 2 tbsp Plum Chutney
- 1 tbsp honey
- 1 tbsp soy sauce
- 1 tbsp olive oil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Sesame seeds (optional)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 200°C (180°C fan) / 392°F. Line a baking dish with parchment paper.
2. In a small bowl, mix Plum Chutney, honey, soy sauce, and olive oil.
3. Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper. Place them on the prepared baking dish.
4. Spoon the chutney mixture evenly over the salmon fillets, ensuring they are well-coated.
5. Sprinkle sesame seeds on top (if using).
6. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until the salmon is cooked through and the glaze is slightly caramelized.
7. Serve hot with your favorite sides.

3. Plum Chutney Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 cup Plum Chutney
- 1 cup Greek yogurt
- 1 tbsp lemon juice
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix Plum Chutney, Greek yogurt, and lemon juice.
2. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Transfer the mixture to a serving dish and chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.
4. Serve with pita bread, crackers, or vegetable sticks.

Details: National Hot Mango Chutney Sauce is a traditional chutney made with the sweetness of mangoes and our signature spices that gives it a flavorful kick.
Recipe:
Mango Chutney is a versatile condiment originating from India, often made with mangoes, spices, vinegar, and sugar. It serves as a great addition to various dishes, adding a sweet and tangy flavor. Here are two recipes using Mango Chutney:

1. Mango Chutney Chicken:
Ingredients:
- 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- 1 cup Mango Chutney
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 2 tablespoons water
- 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
3. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
4. Transfer the chicken to a baking dish.
5. In a small bowl, mix Mango Chutney, honey, and water to form a glaze.
6. Spoon the glaze evenly over the chicken breasts.
7. Bake in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the glaze is caramelized.
8. Remove from the oven and let it rest for 5 minutes before serving, garnished with chopped fresh cilantro.

2. Mango Chutney Shrimp:
Ingredients:
- 1 pound (450g) large shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1 large onion, finely chopped
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
- 1 cup Mango Chutney
- 1 can (14 oz, 400g) diced tomatoes
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice
- 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro

Instructions:
1. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, and jalapeno pepper, and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.
2. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink and firm, about 3-4 minutes. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
3. In the same skillet, add Mango Chutney and diced tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 5-7 minutes to thicken the sauce.
4. Stir in the lime juice.
5. Return the cooked shrimp to the skillet and mix well with the sauce.
6. Cook for 1-2 minutes until the shrimp is heated through.
7. Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro before serving.

Enjoy your Mango Chutney-infused dishes!
Ingredients: - 1 pound (450g) large shrimp, peeled and deveined
- 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped

From the two recipes mentioned, the main ingredient used is Mango Chutney. In addition, you will need olive oil, salt, pepper, honey, water, cilantro for Mango Chutney Chicken, and shrimp, onion, garlic, jalapeno pepper, diced tomatoes, lime juice for Mango Chutney Shrimp.

Details: National Fresh Mint Chutney gives you the refreshing taste of mint to enjoy with any boring old snack, so give your taste buds a treat with National Fresh Mint Chutney Sauce.
Recipe:
Fresh Mint Chutney Recipe:

Ingredients:
1. 1 cup fresh mint leaves
2. 2-3 green chilies (adjust according to spiciness preference)
3. 1 inch ginger, peeled
4. 1 small lemon, juiced
5. 2-3 cloves garlic
6. 1/2 cup fresh cilantro leaves
7. Salt to taste
8. 1-2 tablespoons sugar or jaggery (optional)
9. 2 tablespoons chopped onions (optional)
10. 2 tablespoons chopped coconut (optional)
11. 2-3 tablespoons water
12. 2 tablespoons oil

Instructions:
1. Rinse and drain the mint leaves, green chilies, ginger, and cilantro leaves.
2. In a blender or food processor, add the mint leaves, green chilies, ginger, lemon juice, garlic, salt, sugar (if using), and 1-2 tablespoons of water. Blend until smooth.
3. If desired, add chopped onions and coconut, blending briefly to mix.
4. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Add more salt, sugar, or water if needed.
5. Transfer the mint chutney to a serving bowl.

To serve:
1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a small skillet over medium heat.
2. Add 1/2 teaspoon mustard seeds, 1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds, and a few curry leaves (optional). Once the seeds start to sizzle, turn off the heat.
3. Pour the tempered seeds on top of the mint chutney.

Mint chutney is a versatile condiment that can be used with various Indian dishes such as:
- As a side for roti, naan, or paratha
- With pakoras, samosas, or other fried snacks
- With rice dishes like biryani or pulao
- As a marinade for grilled or roasted meats
- As a flavorful ingredient in salads or sandwiches

Details: National Tangy Tamarind Chutney Sauce has the ultimate sweet, sour and tangy flavor. It’s sure to make any dish pop whether its seafood, chicken, snacks or plain french fries.
Recipe:
Tamarind Chutney is a versatile condiment commonly used in Indian cuisine. It adds a sweet and tangy flavor to various dishes. Here's a simple recipe to make Chicken Tikka with Tamarind Chutney as a side.

**Ingredients for Chicken Tikka:**
1. 500g boneless chicken breast, cut into cubes
2. 2 tbsp yogurt
3. 1 tbsp lemon juice
4. 1 tbsp garam masala
5. 1 tbsp paprika
6. 1 tbsp red chili powder
7. 2 tsp cumin powder
8. 2 tsp coriander powder
9. 2 tsp garlic paste
10. 1 tsp ginger paste
11. Salt to taste

**Ingredients for Tamarind Chutney:**
1. 1 cup tamarind paste
2. 1 cup jaggery (grated)
3. 1 cup water
4. 2 tbsp chopped ginger
5. 2 tbsp chopped garlic
6. 1 tbsp chili powder
7. 1 tbsp cumin seeds
8. 1 tbsp coriander seeds
9. 1 tsp turmeric powder
10. Salt to taste

**Instructions for Chicken Tikka:**
1. In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, garam masala, paprika, chili powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, garlic paste, ginger paste, and salt. Add the chicken cubes, coat evenly, and marinate for 2-3 hours.
2. Preheat your grill or broiler. Place the marinated chicken cubes on the grill rack, approximately 1 inch apart. Grill each side for about 5-6 minutes or until fully cooked.

**Instructions for Tamarind Chutney:**
1. Soak tamarind paste in warm water for 15-20 minutes. Squeeze out the pulp and discard the seeds.
2. In a pan, heat 1 tbsp oil. Add cumin seeds and coriander seeds until they start spluttering.
3. Add ginger, garlic, and chili powder. Sauté until fragrant.
4. Add the tamarind pulp, jaggery, and turmeric powder. Stir well and cook on medium heat until the mixture thickens.
5. Season with salt. Allow it to cool before serving.

Serve the Chicken Tikka with Tamarind Chutney and enjoy your meal!

Details: National Red Chilli Sauce is the ultimate explosion of flavor that wakes up those taste buds and add some heat to boring snacks.
Recipe:
Recipe: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry with Red Chilli Sauce

Ingredients:
1. 1 lb (450g) boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
2. 2 tbsp vegetable oil
3. 2 cloves garlic, minced
4. 1 inch ginger, grated
5. 1 bell pepper, sliced
6. 1 medium onion, sliced
7. 3 cups (300g) mixed vegetables (such as snap peas, carrots, and snow peas)
8. 4 cups (300g) cooked rice
9. 1/2 cup (120ml) Red Chilli Sauce
10. 2 tbsp soy sauce
11. 1 tbsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp water
12. Salt to taste
13. 2 green onions, sliced (for garnish)

Instructions:
1. Heat 1 tbsp of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add sliced chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-6 minutes. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
2. In the same skillet, add 1 tbsp of oil. Sauté minced garlic and grated ginger for 30 seconds until fragrant.
3. Add sliced bell pepper, onion, and mixed vegetables to the skillet. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until the vegetables are slightly tender.
4. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet. Add Red Chilli Sauce and soy sauce. Mix well to coat the chicken and vegetables.
5. In a separate bowl, mix cornstarch with water. Pour the mixture into the skillet and stir well. Cook for 1-2 minutes until the sauce thickens. Season with salt to taste.
6. Serve the spicy chicken stir-fry over cooked rice. Garnish with sliced green onions before serving.

Enjoy your Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry with Red Chilli Sauce!
Ingredients: 1. 1 lb (450g) boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
7. 3 cups (300g) mixed vegetables (such as snap peas, carrots, and snow peas)

Details: National Green Chilli Sauce is the ultimate symphony of flavors with a zesty burst of green chillies and our signature spices.
Recipe:
Recipe: Green Chili Sauce Stir-Fried Tofu with Vegetables

Ingredients:
1. 14 oz (400g) firm tofu, drained and cubed
2. 2 tbsp vegetable oil
3. 2 cloves garlic, minced
4. 1 inch ginger, minced
5. 1 red bell pepper, sliced
6. 1 carrot, sliced
7. 1 zucchini, sliced
8. 1 cup snap peas
9. 1/2 cup green onions, sliced
10. 1/2 cup Green Chili Sauce
11. 2 tbsp soy sauce
12. 1 tbsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp water
13. Salt to taste
14. 2 cups cooked jasmine rice for serving

Instructions:
1. Heat 1 tbsp of vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the tofu cubes and cook until golden brown on all sides, about 5-7 minutes. Remove from skillet and set aside.
2. In the same skillet, add another tbsp of oil. Sauté the minced garlic and ginger for 30 seconds until fragrant.
3. Add the sliced bell pepper, carrot, zucchini, snap peas, and green onions to the skillet. Stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
4. Add the Green Chili Sauce and soy sauce to the skillet, stirring well to coat the vegetables.
5. Add the cooked tofu back into the skillet and stir to combine.
6. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch and water until smooth. Pour this mixture into the skillet and stir continuously until the sauce thickens, about 1-2 minutes.
7. Season with salt to taste.
8. Serve the Green Chili Sauce Stir-Fried Tofu with Vegetables over cooked jasmine rice.

Enjoy your meal!
Ingredients: Based on the provided recipe, here are all the ingredients you'll need:
15. Cooked jasmine rice (2 cups for serving)

Details: National Khatti Meethi Imli Sauce has the ultimate sweet, sour and tangy flavor. It adds a wonderful depth of flavor to various meals and snacks such as samosas, chaats and rolls. Enhance the taste of your snacks with the help of this delicious condiment to get an authentic experience of Pakistani Cuisine.
Recipe:
Imli Sauce, also known as Tamarind Sauce, is a popular ingredient in Indian cuisine. It adds a sour and tangy flavor to dishes. Here's a simple recipe for Tamarind Chickpeas (Chana Choor) using Imli Sauce:

Ingredients:
1. 1 can (400g) of chickpeas, drained and rinsed
2. 1 onion, finely chopped
3. 2 cloves of garlic, minced
4. 1 inch ginger, grated
5. 1 green chili, finely chopped (optional)
6. 1 teaspoon cumin seeds
7. 1 teaspoon coriander powder
8. 1 teaspoon chili powder
9. 1 teaspoon garam masala
10. 2 tablespoons oil
11. 1 cup Imli Sauce
12. Salt to taste
13. 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro (optional)

Instructions:
1. Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add cumin seeds and let them sizzle for a few seconds.
2. Add the chopped onion, garlic, and ginger to the pan. Sauté until the onion turns translucent.
3. Add the green chili (if using) and sauté for another minute.
4. Add the drained chickpeas to the pan. Stir well to coat them with the onion mixture.
5. Add coriander powder, chili powder, and garam masala. Mix well.
6. Pour in the Imli Sauce and stir. Let it simmer for about 10 minutes.
7. Season with salt.
8. Garnish with chopped cilantro (if using) before serving.

Enjoy your Tamarind Chickpeas! This dish pairs well with rice or roti.

No recipe needed for this ready-made product:
- Tamarind Paste: It can be used as a base for various dishes, especially in South Asian cuisine. It's often mixed with water and other spices to make sauces and marinades.

Details: National Khatti Meethi Imli Sauce has the ultimate sweet, sour and tangy flavor. It adds a wonderful depth of flavor to various meals and snacks such as samosas, chaats and rolls. Enhance the taste of your snacks with the help of this delicious condiment to get an authentic experience of Pakistani Cuisine.
Recipe:
Imli Sauce, also known as Tamarind Sauce, is a popular condiment in Indian cuisine. It's typically made from tamarind, jaggery, spices, and other ingredients. Here's a simple recipe to use Imli Sauce to make Chicken Tikka:

Ingredients:
1. 500g boneless chicken breast, cut into cubes
2. 2 tbsp Greek yogurt
3. 1 tbsp lemon juice
4. 1 tbsp garam masala
5. 1 tsp chili powder
6. Salt to taste
7. 1 cup Imli Sauce
8. 1 tbsp vegetable oil
9. Fresh coriander leaves for garnish

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix together the chicken cubes, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, garam masala, chili powder, and salt. Make sure all the chicken pieces are well coated. Marinate this mixture for at least 2 hours or overnight for better flavor.
2. Preheat your oven to 200°C (400°F). Line a baking tray with aluminum foil and brush it with some oil.
3. Place the marinated chicken cubes on the baking tray, making sure they are not overlapping. Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked and slightly charred on the edges.
4. While the chicken is baking, heat 1 tbsp of oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the Imli Sauce and stir well. Let it simmer for a few minutes to allow the flavors to blend together.
5. Once the chicken is done, add it to the pan with the Imli Sauce and stir well to coat the chicken pieces evenly. Cook for another 2-3 minutes.
6. Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve the Chicken Tikka with Imli Sauce over rice or naan bread.

Enjoy your meal!

Details: Prepared with the highest quality ingredients, National Chilli Sauce has a distinct aroma and a spicy kick, it is just what you need to enjoy the perfect authentic Chinese taste. Whether you are looking for the right ingredient to prepare a perfect authentic Chinese recipe, or want to add more flavor to your favorite meals, National Chilli Sauce is what you need to enhance the flavour and spiciness of your favourite meals.
Recipe:
Ingredients:
1. 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
2. 1 bell pepper (any color)
3. 1 medium onion
4. 2 cloves garlic
5. 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
6. 1 can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes, undrained
7. 1 cup uncooked rice
8. 2 cups chicken broth
9. 1 cup Chilli Sauce
10. Salt and pepper to taste
11. Optional toppings: shredded cheese, sour cream, chopped cilantro, diced avocado

Instructions:
1. Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add a little oil if necessary and season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Cook until browned on both sides and fully cooked, about 6-8 minutes per side. Remove from skillet and let rest for a few minutes, then slice.

2. In the same skillet, add a little more oil if necessary. Add sliced bell pepper and diced onion. Cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add minced garlic and cook for another minute.

3. Add drained black beans, undrained diced tomatoes, and sliced cooked chicken to the skillet. Stir to combine.

4. In a separate pot, bring chicken broth to a boil. Stir in uncooked rice, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 18-20 minutes or until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.

5. While the rice is cooking, pour Chilli Sauce into the skillet with the chicken and vegetable mixture. Stir to coat everything evenly and let simmer for 5 minutes. Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper if needed.

6. Serve the Chilli over the cooked rice. Top with desired toppings such as shredded cheese, sour cream, chopped cilantro, or diced avocado.

Enjoy your Chilli with Rice!
Ingredients: The ingredients mentioned in the recipe are:
5. 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
11. Optional toppings: shredded cheese, sour cream, chopped cilantro, diced avocado

Details: Prepared with the highest quality ingredients, National Soy Sauce offers the best taste for enhancing your meals. Whether you are looking for the right ingredient to prepare a perfect authentic Chinese recipe, or want to add more flavor to your favorite meals, National Soy Sauce is just what you need to enjoy the perfect authentic Chinese taste.
Recipe:
Soy sauce is a versatile ingredient in Asian cuisine and can be used in various dishes. One of the simplest and most popular ways to use soy sauce is in making Stir-fried Vegetables with Tofu. Here's a simple recipe for you:

Ingredients:
1. 300g firm tofu, drained and cut into cubes
2. 3-4 cups mixed vegetables (such as bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
3. 2 cloves garlic, minced
4. 1-inch piece of ginger, grated
5. 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
6. 3 tablespoons soy sauce
7. 1 tablespoon sesame oil
8. 1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed with 2 tablespoons water (optional, for thickening)
9. 2 green onions, chopped (for garnish)

Instructions:
1. Heat a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil, swirling to coat the bottom.
2. Add the tofu cubes and cook until golden brown on all sides. Remove the tofu from the wok and set it aside.
3. In the same wok, add another tablespoon of vegetable oil. Add the minced garlic and grated ginger, sautéing for about 30 seconds until fragrant.
4. Add the mixed vegetables to the wok. Stir-fry the vegetables until they are crisp-tender, about 3-4 minutes.
5. Return the tofu to the wok, stirring to combine with the vegetables.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce and sesame oil. Pour this mixture over the tofu and vegetables, tossing to coat evenly.
7. If you prefer a thicker sauce, mix cornstarch with water and pour it into the wok, stirring constantly until the sauce thickens.
8. Remove the wok from heat and garnish with chopped green onions.

Serve this Stir-fried Vegetables with Tofu over rice or noodles. Enjoy your meal!

No recipe needed for this ready-made product:
- Soy sauce concentrates
- Soy sauce marinades
- Soy sauce-based sauces (such as teriyaki sauce or hoisin sauce)

Details: National Synthetic Vinegar is the ideal companion for your favorite salads.
Recipe:
White vinegar is a versatile ingredient used in various dishes for its acidity and flavor. One popular use of white vinegar is in pickling, which can be used to preserve vegetables and add a tangy flavor. Here's a simple recipe for pickled cucumbers:

Ingredients:
1. 4 medium-sized cucumbers
2. 1 1/2 cups of white vinegar
3. 1 1/2 cups of water
4. 2 tablespoons of salt
5. 2 tablespoons of sugar
6. 2 cloves of garlic, peeled and sliced
7. 1 small red onion, thinly sliced
8. 1 teaspoon of mustard seeds
9. 1 teaspoon of coriander seeds
10. 1 teaspoon of black peppercorns
11. 1 bay leaf
12. 2 sprigs of fresh dill

Instructions:
1. Wash the cucumbers thoroughly and cut them into spears or rounds, depending on your preference.
2. In a large jar, combine the sliced garlic, red onion, mustard seeds, coriander seeds, black peppercorns, bay leaf, and dill.
3. Place the cucumber slices or spears into the jar, packing them tightly but not crushing them.
4. In a small saucepan, bring the white vinegar, water, salt, and sugar to a boil, stirring until the salt and sugar are completely dissolved.
5. Pour the hot vinegar mixture over the cucumbers, making sure they are fully submerged. Let the mixture cool to room temperature.
6. Cover the jar and refrigerate for at least 24 hours before serving. The pickles can be stored in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.

White vinegar is also commonly used in salad dressings, marinades, and as a cleaning agent for kitchen surfaces. It can also help tenderize meat by breaking down the collagen when used in a marinade.
Ingredients: 6. 2 cloves of garlic, peeled and sliced

Details: National Ginger Paste is prepared with pure and fresh ginger. It is your secret kitchen companion to help you prepare delicious meals everyday with convenience.
Recipe:
Ginger Paste is a versatile ingredient used in various dishes worldwide. Here's a simple yet delicious recipe for Ginger Chicken, which is a popular dish in many Asian countries.

**Ingredients:**
1. 500g Chicken Breast, cut into pieces
2. 3 tablespoons Ginger Paste
3. 2 tablespoons Garlic Paste
4. 2 tablespoons Soy Sauce
5. 2 tablespoons Honey
6. 1 tablespoon Rice Vinegar
7. 1 tablespoon Sesame Oil
8. 1 tablespoon Cornstarch
9. 2 tablespoons Water
10. 1 Red Bell Pepper, sliced
11. 1 Yellow Bell Pepper, sliced
12. 1 Green Bell Pepper, sliced
13. 2 Spring Onions, sliced
14. 2 tablespoons Oil for stir-frying
15. Salt to taste

**Instructions:**
1. In a bowl, combine the ginger paste, garlic paste, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, and sesame oil. Mix well to form a marinade.
2. Add the chicken pieces to the marinade and ensure they are well coated. Let it marinate for at least 30 minutes to an hour, or preferably overnight.
3. In a separate bowl, mix cornstarch with 2 tablespoons of water to form a slurry.
4. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pan or wok over high heat. Once hot, add the marinated chicken pieces and stir-fry until they are fully cooked. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.
5. In the same pan, add another tablespoon of oil. Add the sliced bell peppers and stir-fry until they are tender.
6. Add the cooked chicken back into the pan with the bell peppers. Pour the cornstarch slurry over the mixture. Stir continuously until the sauce thickens.
7. Season with salt if needed and garnish with sliced spring onions before serving.

Enjoy your Ginger Chicken! It pairs well with steamed rice or noodles.
Ingredients: 10. 3 Red Bell Pepper, sliced (Since the recipe mentions 1 Red Bell Pepper but uses it in slices, I assume it's meant to be 3)
11. 3 Yellow Bell Pepper, sliced (Same as Red Bell Pepper)
12. 3 Green Bell Pepper, sliced (Same as Red Bell Pepper)

Details: National Ginger & Garlic Paste is prepared with pure and fresh ginger & garlic. It is your secret kitchen companion to help you prepare delicious meals everyday with convenience.
Recipe:
Sure, Ginger Garlic Paste is a versatile ingredient often used in Asian and Indian cuisines. Here's a simple recipe for making a popular dish called Ginger Garlic Chicken.

Ingredients:
1. 500g Chicken Breast (boneless and skinless)
2. 3 tablespoons Ginger Garlic Paste (adjust to taste)
3. 2 tablespoons Lemon Juice
4. 1 tablespoon Red Chili Powder
5. 1 tablespoon Coriander Powder
6. 1 teaspoon Turmeric Powder
7. 1 teaspoon Cumin Powder
8. 2 tablespoons Oil
9. Salt to taste
10. 2 tablespoons chopped Cilantro (optional)

Recipe:
1. Marinate: In a bowl, combine the ginger garlic paste, lemon juice, red chili powder, coriander powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder, and salt. Mix well. Add the chicken pieces and ensure they are well coated with the marinade. Let it rest for at least 30 minutes or overnight for best results.

2. Cook: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Add the marinated chicken pieces and cook until they are golden brown and fully cooked. Stir occasionally to prevent burning.

3. Garnish: Once done, sprinkle chopped cilantro on top before serving.

Serve this Ginger Garlic Chicken with steamed rice or roti for a complete meal. Enjoy your cooking!

Details: National Garlic Paste is prepared with pure and fresh garlic. It is your secret kitchen companion to help you prepare delicious meals everyday with convenience.
Recipe:
Garlic Paste is a versatile ingredient that can be used in a variety of dishes to add flavor. Here's a simple recipe for Garlic Chicken, which is a popular dish that uses garlic paste:

Ingredients:
1. 500g boneless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
2. 4-5 tablespoons of garlic paste
3. 2 tablespoons of lemon juice
4. 2 tablespoons of olive oil
5. 1 teaspoon of red chili powder (adjust according to your spice tolerance)
6. 1 teaspoon of turmeric powder
7. 1 teaspoon of coriander powder
8. Salt to taste
9. 2 tablespoons of chopped fresh coriander leaves
10. 2 medium-sized onions, finely chopped
11. 2 medium-sized tomatoes, finely chopped
12. 2 green chilies, slit (optional)
13. 2 tablespoons of oil for stir-frying

Instructions:
1. In a bowl, mix the garlic paste, lemon juice, olive oil, red chili powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, and salt. Add the chicken pieces to this marinade and mix well to ensure all pieces are coated. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or overnight for best results.
2. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large pan or wok over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté until they turn golden brown.
3. Add the chopped tomatoes and green chilies (if using) to the pan and cook until the tomatoes are soft and mushy.
4. Now add the marinated chicken pieces to the pan. Stir-fry for about 7-8 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the marinade has thickened to a sauce-like consistency.
5. Garnish with chopped fresh coriander leaves before serving.

Garlic Paste can also be used in a variety of other dishes such as soups, stews, curries, and even in baking. It adds a rich, aromatic flavor to any dish. Enjoy your cooking!
Ingredients: 1. 500g boneless chicken breasts or thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
9. 2 tablespoons of chopped fresh coriander leaves

Details: National Foods offers a range of savory snack mixes and seasonings; which are a combination of spices used in the preparation of traditional snack dishes.
Recipe:
Chat Masala is a popular Indian spice blend used as a seasoning and garnish. It typically contains a mix of cumin, coriander, chili, salt, black salt, aniseed, and other flavorings. Here's a simple recipe for using Chat Masala to make a popular Indian snack called Roasted Chana (chickpeas).

Ingredients:
1. 2 cups (500 ml) chickpeas (soaked overnight and drained)
2. 2 tbsp (30 ml) vegetable oil
3. 1 tsp (5 ml) Chat Masala
4. 1 tsp (5 ml) chili powder (optional, for added heat)
5. Salt to taste
6. Juice of 1 lemon
7. 2 tbsp (30 ml) chopped cilantro (optional, for garnish)

Instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Spread the drained chickpeas evenly on a baking sheet.
3. Drizzle the oil over the chickpeas and rub them gently to ensure they are evenly coated.
4. Sprinkle the Chat Masala, chili powder (if using), and salt over the chickpeas. Mix well to ensure all chickpeas are seasoned.
5. Bake the chickpeas in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy. Stir the chickpeas every 10 minutes to prevent burning.
6. Remove the roasted chickpeas from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Squeeze the juice of 1 lemon over the chickpeas. If desired, garnish with chopped cilantro.
8. Serve the roasted chickpeas as a snack or use them as a topping for salads or bowls.

Enjoy your Chat Masala Roasted Chana!
Ingredients: 1. 2 cups (500 ml) chickpeas (soaked overnight and drained)
